Title: Learning Classifier System Trainer
Description:
NOT in a publishable state, but published otherwise it will be removed! Please wait until March 2010. Thanks.
This project demonstrates an implementation of a learning classifier system, which allows students to modify the classifier behaviour. It is developed in C# and WP
HomeWiki:
Project Description
NOT in a publishable state, but published otherwise it will be removed! Please wait until March 2010. Thanks.
This project demonstrates an implementation of a learning classifier system, which allows students to modify the classifier behaviour. It is developed in C# and WP

Currently the project contains a modified version of WPFPropertyGrid http://wpg.codeplex.com. This is due to being unable to contact the original project author regarding submitting fixes. Hopefully this will be rectified soon.
